Posts.Content: hello Im going through something similar my self. Ive had both lungs drained and both have had the talc put in (pleuradisis) sp!! Ive been put on an oral chemo and have to go back in three weeks time to see if its working. Sorry Im as much in the dark as you are about this. But I will keep you posted MIne also stemmed from breast cancer
Posts.Title: Mother diagnosed with stage IV met breast to the lung sack
